about_the_game:
NOTHING BUT A GLITCH

Play as Guro, a bog-slogger set to free the world of shackles of the corporation by submerging herself into the deepest layers of the cyberspace and destroying the system from within. When the rules of the game are broken, all you need is a glitch.

INTO THE BOG

Even with the Bog constantly changing, you are able to retain permanent shards of it. They grant you power to progress and design your next attempt instead of relying on the mercurial nature of the system. As you get farther into the network, you discover new ways of playing the game. Or breaking it.

HARD RESET

TECHNOBOG is built for replayability. Not only do you get to choose between numerous options within a single run, you can also affect how the entire game is played by discovering new content. Your progress in one run opens up new levels for you to discover when you start the next one.

THE SCENE

You're not alone in your journey to the core of this system. Not completely. Make friends and enemies as you develop your relationship with others throughout numerous attempts.

FEATURES:

  • Aim your strike and slice any obstacle in your path in any way you desire
  • Transform into a beam of light
  • Grow a tentacle arm
  • Teleport onto your dagger
  • A unique blend of 3D platforming and hack and slash
  • Emphasis on creativity in combat
  • Made by one person

THE MANY LAYERS OF THE BOG


Get ready to explore the TECHNOBOG with all its layers. From the sci-fi chambers inspired by the classics of the 80s to the colorful toxic grasslands.

name: TECHNOBOG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, AMD FX™-6300, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600, or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660TI with 6 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Hack and slash through the web of the corporate network in this merciless fast-paced 3D roguelite that blends freedom of movement and creative combat.
